Name: In The Shadow Of The Truth
About the game: Are You Ready? Do you trust your intelligence ? One night,our character who fell asleep in his office, when he woke up face with strange things. He can't remember how fell asleep in his office and even his name . He understood has to go home as soon as possible but that won't be easy.
